title: All Ball - Utah St. Forward Justin Bean on Trae Young HS Matchups, Tourney Chances, Playing HARD, Pro Aspirations
itunes:title: All Ball - Utah St. Forward Justin Bean on Trae Young HS Matchups, Tourney Chances, Playing HARD, Pro Aspirations
description:
In this episode, Doug talks with Utah State Forward Justin Bean. He discusses facing off against Trae Young in high school in Oklahoma, his Mormon mission experience in Reno, his transition into college hoops after a long layoff, his reputation for playing insanely hard, his take on his team's tourney hopes. and if he sees pro ball in his future. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
